TopicTitle: Replace the 'Kerbal Space Program' title in the main menu

Articles.Content:
Mod Idea: Replace the 'Kerbal Space Program' title with 'Mod it till it crashes' in the main menu

Got the idea from here...

http://www.reddit.com/r/KerbalSpaceProgram/comments/2p80fg/i_spent_more_time_on_this_than_i_care_to_admit/

What d'you think?
